dmca.title: FW: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref. 39471
dmca.body:
-

>  
> 
> *From:* MSAntiPiracy02 [mailto:Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com]
> *Sent:* Wednesday, January 25, 2006 8:04 AM
> *To:* abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
> *Subject:* Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing 
> Activity - MS Ref. 39471
> 
> VIA EMAIL:
> 
> Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity
> 
> URL: http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=32&hit=1

> <http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=77&hit=1>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=32&name=Microsoft.Office.12.Beta
> .1.AIO.DVD.READ.NFO-WinBeta.torrent
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=32&name=Microsoft.Office.12.Bet
> a.1.AIO.DVD.READ.NFO-WinBeta.torrent>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=27&name=Age.Of.Empires.III-RELOA
> DED.torrent 
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=27&name=Age.Of.Empires.III-RELO
> ADED.torrent> 
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=37&name=Office.2003.SP1.AIO-XiSO
> .iso.torrent 
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=37&name=Office.2003.SP1.AIO-XiS
> O.iso.torrent> 
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=77&name=Microsoft%20Plus%21%20Di
> gital%20Media%20Edition.torrent 
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=77&name=Microsoft%20Plus%21%20D
> igital%20Media%20Edition.torrent>
> 
> CASE #: 39471
> 
> 25 January 2006
> 
> Dear Sir or Madam,
> 
> Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which 
> appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed 
> copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to 
> copyrighted works published by Microsoft.
> 
> 1. Identification of copyrighted works:
> 
> Copyrighted work(s):
> Office 12 Beta
> Age of Empires
> Office Professional Edition 2003
> Plus! Digital Media Edition
> 
> Copyright owner:
> Microsoft Corporation
> 
> 2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following
> location(s): http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=32&hit=1
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=32&hit=1>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=27&hit=1
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=27&hit=1>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=37&hit=1
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=37&hit=1>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=77&hit=1
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/torrents-details.php?id=77&hit=1>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=32&name=Microsoft.Office.12.Beta
> .1.AIO.DVD.READ.NFO-WinBeta.torrent
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=32&name=Microsoft.Office.12.Bet
> a.1.AIO.DVD.READ.NFO-WinBeta.torrent>
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=27&name=Age.Of.Empires.III-RELOA
> DED.torrent 
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=27&name=Age.Of.Empires.III-RELO
> ADED.torrent> 
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=37&name=Office.2003.SP1.AIO-XiSO
> .iso.torrent 
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=37&name=Office.2003.SP1.AIO-XiS
> O.iso.torrent> 
> http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=77&name=Microsoft%20Plus%21%20Di
> gital%20Media%20Edition.torrent 
> <http://www.iqcrew.net/download.php?id=77&name=Microsoft%20Plus%21%20D
> igital%20Media%20Edition.torrent>
> 
> 
> The above computer program(s) is being made available for copying, 
> through downloading, at the above location without authorization of 
> the copyright owner.
> 
> 3. Statement of authority:
> 
> The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under 
> penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft, 
> the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above.  I have 
> a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed 
> above have been authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.
> 
> We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you 
> take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material 
> described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and 
> distribution of this software via your company's network.
> 
> We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us 
> regarding what actions you take.
> 
> Yours sincerely,
> 
> James Young
> Internet Investigator
> 
> on behalf of Microsoft Corporation
> One Microsoft Way
> Redmond, WA 98052
> United States of America
> 
> E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com
>
